comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Native of the Netherlands. A dramatic tenor, whose recordings of Wagner are held in high esteem. This looks like a photo taken aboard ship in New York harbor, as Urlus arrived for a performance at the Met. Indeed it was at the Met, during a performance of Tristan and Isolde on Christmas Eve, 1913 (around the time of this photo), that Urlus was stricken with severe and incapacitating indigestion, but managed to finish the opera, in what was hailed as a brilliant success.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Thanks for the additional info. on Urlus.  We'll include it next time we update.
